title: Machi Gurumi no Wana: Hakudaku ni Mamireta Shitai

alternative_titles.ja: 町ぐるみの罠～白濁にまみれた肢体～

synopsis:
Lewd eyes from all directions... Atsuko has just moved to a town to work as a teacher. She looks forward to her new life there, but what awaits her is... Yes, she gradually gets involved in a storm of sexual assaults planned by the everyone in town...

(Source: ErogeShop)
